scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../phonebook/ && npm run build && cp -r build ../phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy:fly-full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy:fly
scripts.deploy:heroku: cd ../../ && git subtree push --prefix part3/phonebook-backend heroku master
scripts.deploy:heroku-full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy:heroku
